Name: Gerritory
About the game: Gerritory is a 4-player action party game with unique game rules and minimalistic visuals. You and your friends move cube characters in various levels and color tiles to score points. How To Play Move and color the tiles to score points. Crush the superior players by stepping on them! Key Features Online & local play for up to 4 players. Fill up the party vacancy with our most advanced AI players. Unlock more than 40 levels with different tiles and features, and never get bored! Additional level environments that challenge your skills. Utilize various power-ups to win the game strategically. Different match types: you can play either for a long session or just one single game. Customize game objectives and environments in the custom match! Play as different cute and stylish cube characters, be different from your friends! Support keyboard remapping: 1 keyboard with 4 players is possible! (Still recommended to use controllers)
